nodes.text: Unna Lettu was a painter from the planet Antar 4, the homeworld of the Gotal species. Lettu was considered the planet's most famous painter by 980 BBY. During this time, Dark Jedi Set Harth owned several of Lettu's landscapes, which he set for display in his mansion on the planet Nal Hutta.
Unna Lettu was mentioned in the 2009 novel Darth Bane: Dynasty of Evil, written by Drew Karpyshyn. Neither Lettu's species nor gender were established.
